name: State Street Corporation
membership: We are members of several industry associations active in the EU, including EFAMA, ICMA, EPFSF, IA, BBA, DATA, ALFI, ABBL, BDB, VAB and TheCityUK.
goal: State Street Corporation (NYSE: STT) is one of the world's leading providers of financial services to institutional investors, including investment servicing, investment management, and investment research and trading. With $29 trillion in assets under custody and administration and $2.47 trillion  in assets under management as of December 31, 2016, State Street operates in more than 100 geographic markets worldwide, including the US, Canada, Europe, the Middle East and Asia.
interests: Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Internal Market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
UCITS
Money Market Funds Regulation
EMIR
MiFID II/MiFIR
CSDR
SFTR
Shareholder Rights Directive
